definition: come to have or undergo a change of (physical features and attributes)
details:
verb
- come to have or undergo a change of (physical features and attributes)
= synonyms: get
- pass into a condition gradually, take on a specific property or attribute
= synonyms: turn
- become larger, greater, or bigger
- increase in size by natural process
= example: increase in size by natural process
- cause to grow or develop
= example: cause to grow or develop
- develop and reach maturity
= synonyms: mature
- become attached by or as if by the process of growth
= example: become attached by or as if by the process of growth
- grow emotionally or mature
= synonyms: develop
- cultivate by growing, often involving improvements by means of agricultural techniques
= synonyms: farm
- come into existence
= synonyms: rise
